body:
What do you think about this snapshot? Do you think this is a joke, because is a snapshot in the april fools or not?

I think that Mojang is doing a joke.

Comment about that.
body_tagged:
What do you think about this snapshot? Do you think this is a joke, because is a snapshot in the april fools or not?

title: Snapshot 15w14a

replies.body: I explain me better. This snapshot says that combat will be out in the version 1.10. So all mobs will be peaceful and we will cant combat
replies.body_tagged: I explain me better. This snapshot says that combat will be out in the version 1.10. So all mobs will be peaceful and we will cant combat

replies.body: Wait what? "We will can't combat". What does this mean, I hope it doesn't mean what I think it does.
replies.body_tagged: Wait what? "We will can't combat". What does this mean, I hope it doesn't mean what I think it does.

replies.body: Yes it is what are u thinking, see any video of this snapshot and u will see it
replies.body_tagged: Yes it is what are u thinking, see any video of this snapshot and u will see it

replies.body: This was an april fools joke. It says that in the first line of the text on mojang.com. I don't see how you could have missed that.
replies.body_tagged: This was an april fools joke. It says that in the first line of the text on mojang.com. I don't see how you could have missed that.
